did.unittitle: Engineers and Scientists of America Records, 1952-1960
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Collection consists of, historical documents, Executive Board, Officer, and financial records, Convention documents, local/member society files, subject files, publications and photographs.

scopecontent.p: This collection is arranged by office of origin and alphabetically by subject thereunder.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Engineers and Scientists of America Records #5574. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
